list.notApplyingReason: This executor doesn’t want to apply now, but may do in the future (this is also known as power reserved)

declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.confirm: We confirm that we will administer the estate of generic_fname generic_lname, according to law. We will:
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks us to do so, we will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.submitWarning: Once everyone has agreed the legal statement and made their declaration, this information can’t be changed.
declaration.understandItem1: our application will be rejected if we do not answer any questions about the information we have given
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against us if we are found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest

legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information generic_fname generic_lname has given in their application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.deceased: generic_fname generic_lname was born on 1 February 1953 and died on 4 May 2017, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.applicant: We, generic_fname generic_lname of Buckingham Palace London SW1A 1AA United Kingdom  and executor2 of Buckingham Palace London SW1A 1AA United Kingdom , make the following statement:

executorsApplying.name: generic_fname generic_lname, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.
executorsApplying.sign: generic_fname generic_lname will send to the probate registry what we have seen and believe to be the true and original last will and testament of generic_fname generic_lname.

executorsApplying.name: executor2, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.

legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of our knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in generic_fname generic_lname which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of generic_fname generic_lname and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.

declarationItems.title: We, generic_fname generic_lname of Buckingham Palace London SW1A 1AA United Kingdom  and executor2 of Buckingham Palace London SW1A 1AA United Kingdom , make the following statement:
generic_fname generic_lname was born on 1 February 1953 and died on 4 May 2017, domiciled in England and Wales.

sections.title: The estate of the person who died

declarationItems.title: The gross value for the estate amounts to £1.00 and the net value for the estate amounts to £1.00.

To the best of our knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in generic_fname generic_lname which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of generic_fname generic_lname and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
generic_fname generic_lname, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.
generic_fname generic_lname will send to the probate registry what we have seen and believe to be the true and original last will and testament of generic_fname generic_lname.
executor2, an executor named in the will, is applying for probate.

values: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
keep a full account of how the estate has been administered

return the grant of probate to the court
